• In this mode, all messages in the conversation, including AI responses, will always be sent to the API when sending a new message. This way, the AI will be able to get the context of the conversation and respond as if it were a chat, like ChatGPT. \n• More tokens will be used over time, consequently increasing consumption on your account. \n• AI models have a token limit of 2048/4000. When receiving a maximum token limit reached error, it is recommended to clear the chat or start a new one.

• Recommended if you want to use the AI to make isolated questions. With this you will not have a \"real chat\", but you will still have all the power of the AI for searches, text correction, translation or things like that. \n• Fewer tokens will be used than in Chat Mode, because with each request only the last message in the conversation is sent, causing less consumption on your account. \n• If you often face the problem of the AI responding incompletely, it is recommended to increase the maximum number of tokens in the conversation a little, as in this mode it is not possible to ask the AI to continue its response if the response is cut off.
Your API key is invalid. Check if you inserted the API key correctly or visit the OpenAI website to get a new key.

You have reached the maximum token limit in this conversation. It is recommended to start a new one or clear this chat. This can happen when the conversation reaches a high number of used tokens or if you are inserting a very large number of characters in the message.
The server is currently overloaded with other requests. Try again or wait a while until the server stabilizes.
Oops! It seems there was an unknown error trying to get a response from the AI. Try again or check if your internet connection is working properly.

• Most capable GPT-3 model. Can do any task the other models can do, often with higher quality, longer output and better instruction tracking. 
• Recommended if you want more accurate and up-to-date responses. 
• Training data: up to June 2021. 
• Maximum support of 4000 tokens. 
• Cost of $0.0200 / 1K tokens.

• Very capable, faster and cheaper than text_davinci_003. However, it may present less accurate responses than the text_davinci_003 model, especially when it comes to programming codes. 
• Recommended if you want to have lower cost on your account. 
• Training data: up to October 2019. 
• Maximum support of 2048 tokens. 
• Cost of $0.0020 / 1K tokens.

• The maximum number of tokens that can be generated in the AI's response. 
• Tokens are like pieces of words, where 1,000 tokens are about 750 words. This count can vary depending on the language. 
• A high number decreases the chances of cut responses, while a lower number may limit the AI's responses to a certain number of characters (tokens). 
• A number of 256 tokens does not mean that the AI will always use 256 tokens, but only that it can use that amount.

• What sampling temperature to use. \n• Higher values mean the model will take more risks. Try 0.9 to get more creative responses and 0 for more well-defined responses. \n• The closer to 1, the greater the chances of the AI responding differently to the same question.
